name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.agentTool
semantic_context: Generates an action plan and executes it. Can use external tools.

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: AI Agent that can call other tools
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

text.name: text
text.placeholder: e.g. Hello, how can you help me?

notice.displayName: Connect an output parser on the canvas to specify the output format you require
notice.name: notice

fallbackNotice.displayName: Connect an additional language model on the canvas to use it as a fallback if the main model fails
fallbackNotice.name: fallbackNotice

options.name: options
systemMessage
options.description: The message that will be sent to the agent before the conversation starts

options.name: maxIterations
options.description: The maximum number of iterations the agent will run before stopping

options.name: returnIntermediateSteps
options.description: Whether or not the output should include intermediate steps the agent took

options.name: passthroughBinaryImages
options.description: Whether or not binary images should be automatically passed through to the agent as image type messages

options.name: batching
options.description: Batch processing options for rate limiting

options.name: batchSize
options.description: How many items to process in parallel. This is useful for rate limiting, but might impact the log output ordering.

options.name: delayBetweenBatches
options.description: Delay in milliseconds between batches. This is useful for rate limiting.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF hasOutputParser == True THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF needsFallback == True THEN SHOW parameter 'fallbackNotice'
